title: 95/175/EC: Commission Decision of 7 March 1995 repealing Decision 91/146/EEC concerning protective measures against cholera in Peru (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 7 March 1995 repealing Decision 91/146/EEC concerning protective measures against cholera in Peru (Text with EEA relevance) (95/175/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Decision 91/146/EEC is hereby repealed with effect from 1 February 1995.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 March 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 73, 20. 3. 1991, p. 34.
(3) OJ No L 276, 19. 9. 1992, p. 26.
(4) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
